title: :: 'Share your ears... '..'.. raise donations to make Disney on a labyrinth?
subtitle: From 29 January to 14 March 2016, Disney Park will donate $5 to Make-A-with for each shared ear image on the Internet.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: If you share a picture of yourself wearing Mickey Mouse's ears, Disney Park will donate $5 to A-wise.
